Pull Herring data

Source: R/get_herring_data.R
get_herring_data.Rd

Herring Data comes from the state of Maine and replaces the herring data from StockEff (since it is incomplete). Pulled from NEFSC_GARFO.maine_herring_catch

Usage

get_herring_data(channel, comland, filterByYear, filterByArea, useForeign)

Arguments

channel

an Object inherited from Oracle. This object is used to connect to communicate with the database engine. (see connect_to_database)

comland

Data frame. master data frame containing species landings

filterByYear

numeric vector. Years to retrieve data for (Default = NA, pull all years)

filterByArea

numeric vector. Statistical Areas to retrieve data for (Default = NA, pull all areas)

useForeign

boolean. Pull foreign data from NAFO. Default = T

Value

Processed Herring data added to comland
